metadata.title: CVE-2020-36228 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An integer underflow was discovered in OpenLDAP before 2.4.57 leading to aslapd crash in the Certificate List Exact Assertion processing, resultingin denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36228` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ldap-utils - 2.4.49+dfsg-2ubuntu1.6
libldap-2.4-2 - 2.4.49+dfsg-2ubuntu1.6
libldap-common - 2.4.49+dfsg-2ubuntu1.6
slapd - 2.4.49+dfsg-2ubuntu1.6
slapd-contrib - 2.4.49+dfsg-2ubuntu1.6
slapd-smbk5pwd - 2.4.49+dfsg-2ubuntu1.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openldap package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.49+dfsg-2ubuntu1.6').
